heroImage.altText: A village in the Snæfellsnes peninsula of western Iceland

mainContent.text: I’m Frank Congson. Welcome to my digital home. Join me as I share my photography, travels, and other stories along the way.

sections.text: Photography is one of my passions in life. I love incorporating it into other aspects of my life and capturing the world around me.

image.altText: A view of the Canadian Rocky Mountains at the top of the Banff Gondola in Alberta, Canada

sections.text: I’m a dad, husband, traveler, minimalist, full stack developer, and rock climber.
